name: Castle of Sorrow
overview: A video adventure where we control Constantín, who wants to avenge the death of his beloved. We will have to enter a mysterious castle and solve the enigmas that await us there. Under this classic premise, we are faced with a platform game and screen by screen exploration in which our character is endowed with an energy bar that will decrease as it rubs against enemies, or suffers the already omnipresent deadly drop, present in some passages.
